data.title: System Architecture
data.description: Understanding the layered architecture of JsonPages: from JSON data to rendered components.

cards.title: Data Layer
cards.description: JSON files define content and configuration. Site.json for globals, [slug].json for page bodies.

cards.title: Registry Layer
cards.description: MTRP maps section types to React components. No switch statements, pure registry lookup.

cards.title: Render Layer
cards.description: PageRenderer assembles the Sandwich: Header + Body Sections + Footer.
